articles.description: The 353 are 'released for filing,' which in police language means detention while inquest is waived
articles.content: Metro Manila had the highest number of curfew violators with 4,394; of them, 605 were warned, 1,235 were fined, 2,201 were sanctioned with community service, and 353 were released for filing.
